synopsis.text: No swords, no money, no problem for Shichika Yasuri, the last practitioner of the Kyotouryuu sword art that uses the body as a blade. Living in seclusion with his sister Nanami, their peaceful existence is disrupted by the arrival of Togame Hida, a cunning strategist for the Bakufu government. In a world where the power of swords can shape the fate of nations, Togame seeks to gather the 12 legendary 'deviant blades' created by master swordsmith Shikizaki Kiki. With each sword possessing extraordinary abilities, Shichika and Togame embark on a thrilling journey to recover them from their powerful wielders. As they navigate through political intrigue and face off against formidable adversaries, the duo forms an unbreakable bond, discovering the true potential of the swordless Kyotouryuu style. Join Shichika and Togame on an epic adventure that transcends reality and redefines the essence of the sword.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
